oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Machine Learning, Quantum Mechanics, and Chemical Compound Space
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ramakrishnan, Raghunathan
von Lilienfeld, O. Anatole
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Physics - Chemical Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We review recent studies dealing with the generation of machine learning models of molecular and solid properties. The models are trained and validated using standard quantum chemistry results obtained for organic molecules and materials selected from chemical space at random.
